trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services"></xref> namespace primarily contains classes that are used in applications built using Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) that perform federated authentication with the WS-Federation protocol.

It contains the HTTP Modules, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref> (WSFAM) and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref> (SAM), as well as classes that support their operation.
The WSFAM provides handling for the WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out sequences and the SAM provides session management by maintaining and handling cookies.

The namespace also contains classes that represent WS-Federation messages (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage"></xref>), such as sign-in (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage"></xref>) and sign-out messages (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutRequestMessage"></xref>), as well as serializers that serialize and deserialize between the object model and the on-the-wire representations of these messages.
